description.narrative: The project development objective is to help improve the availability, reliability, efficiency and financial viability of electricity supply in Cote d'Ivoire.

condition.narrative: GoCI to eliminate operating subsidies to the sector
GoCI to seek cabinet approval of a revised electricity law
The Recipient shall complete the liquidation of EECI and transfer all remaining assets to the Project Implementing Entity.
The Recipient shall contribute the equivalent of $1,000,000 to the revolving fund established under Part 3 (a) (iv) of the Project.
The Recipient shall have completed implementation of the recommendations of the tariff study carried out under the Project.
The Recipient shall transfer to the Project Implementing Entity, all sectoral assets as set out in the sectoral asset register
reduction in payment arrears for electricity by public sector bodies
